items.name: Ventor's Gamble
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

items.name: Progenesis
explicitMods: When Hit during effect, 25% of Life loss from Damage taken occurs over 4 seconds instead
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

items.name: Fate Cowl
implicitMods: 11% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
explicitMods: 10% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
craftedMods: 45% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain Rare or Unique Enemies

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that can kill enemies.
explicitMods: 70% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Enemies Slain from Supported Skills
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).
explicitMods: Base Burning Damage is 25% of Overkill Damage
Buff grants 15% of your Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Buff grants 13% more Spell Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any non-blessing skill with a reservation.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 19% increased Aura effect
Supported Skills Reserve Life instead of Mana
Supported Skills have 4% increased Life Reservation Efficiency
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants accuracy and critical strike chance to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 28% increased Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies gain +223 to Accuracy Rating
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Mind Skewer
implicitMods: Gain 15% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
explicitMods: Gain 14% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
Gain 14% of Physical Damage as Extra Lightning Damage
25% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
8% chance to gain Onslaught for 4 seconds on Kill
7% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Critical Strike
craftedMods: Moving while Bleeding doesn't cause you to take extra Damage

items.name: Tempest Veil
implicitMods: +1 to Level of all Vaal Skill Gems
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Skill Gems
+10% to Quality of Socketed Skill Gems
Enemies you Kill have a 33% chance to Explode, dealing a tenth of their maximum Life as Physical Damage

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants extra cold damage based on physical damage to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 26% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
You and nearby allies deal 19% more Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff adding cold damage to spells and attacks. If you shatter an enemy, this skill will cause them to explode and deal AoE cold damage to enemies near them. This damage is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.
explicitMods: Buff grants 40 to 61 Added Attack Cold Damage
Buff grants 40 to 61 Added Spell Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Non-Minion Allies have a 10% chance to create Consecrated Ground on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy, lasting 8 seconds
You and nearby allies have 40% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 16% more Spell Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants armour to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2153 additional Armour
You and nearby allies gain 50% more Armour
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Your life cannot be raised above low life other than by flasks, and while above low life, skills will cost life as well as mana.
explicitMods:
Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 45% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 141% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Headhunter
explicitMods: 28% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds
flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

items.name: Divination Distillate
explicitMods: 12% increased Quantity of Items found during Effect
30% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Knowledge is fermented in pain and loss
Distilled with reflection
To quench the thirst of those
who dream of enlightenment

items.name: Goldwyrm

flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 42 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 661 total Damage from Hits

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.

socketedItems.secDescrText: This spell creates ethereal blades which orbit in an area around you, dealing damage every 0.6 seconds to all enemies in their radius. As more blades are added, the damage becomes greater and more frequent.
explicitMods: 35% increased Hit Rate for each blade
Can have up to 10 active spinning blades
10% increased Critical Strike Chance for each blade
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Skill Effect Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
hybrid.secDescrText: Creates an independently-moving vortex of ethereal blades which lasts for a duration. The vortex moves toward nearby enemies, repeatedly damaging enemies that it passes through.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spell skills, making their effect reoccur when cast. Cannot support skills with cooldowns, triggered skills, Brand skills, Vaal skills, channelling skills, skills with a reservation, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 10% increased Spell Damage

Supported Spells gain a Seal every 0.66 seconds, to a maximum of 4 Seals
Supported Spells are Unsealed when cast, and their effects Reoccur for each Seal lost
Supported Skills deal 38% less Damage when Reoccurring

items.name: Eyes of the Greatwolf
flavourText: I am but a vessel for a greater force.
It acts through me. Speaks through me.
Decides what lives and dies through me.
And will change the world through me.

items.name: Sadima's Touch
implicitMods: Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness on Hit
explicitMods: Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks
flavourText: Wealth unspent is wealth wasted.

socketedItems.secDescrText: An icy blast explodes around the caster, dealing cold damage to enemies, and leaving behind a whirling vortex which deals cold damage over time and chills enemies caught in it. If the caster targets near their Frostbolt projectiles, it will explode from a number of those projectiles instead, destroying them.
explicitMods: Deals 116.1 Base Cold Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
20% less Area of Effect when Cast on Frostbolt
Can explode from up to 5 Frostbolt Projectiles

Enemies in Chilling Areas from Supported Skills increase Cold Damage taken by Chill Effect

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their cold resistance and giving them a chance to be frozen when hit.

Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Freeze
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Must support both a skill that hits enemies, and a hex curse skill to work. The hex will be applied when enemies are hit by the other skill. Cannot support totems, traps, or mines. Minions cannot apply hexes this way.

You cannot Cast Supported Curse Spells
